important_notes: Limitation is a matter of procedure, not substantive law
Court cannot extend limitation period except in cases of sufficient cause (Section 5)
Acknowledgment in writing interrupts limitation period (Section 18)
Part payment of debt interrupts limitation (Section 19)
Limitation period runs from date cause of action accrues
Court must dismiss suit if filed after limitation period, even if not pleaded by defendant
